name: Colisseum
description:
Colisseum is a First Person Shooter  where the player will face a boss who owns a state tree. The boss will have three
states that will change as you lose life, your attacks they will be direct and remote and some indirect.

Titan Souls-serves as the main reference since it shows us a fight against bosses where the player will only have an arrow to eliminate the boss at the right moment, it fits perfectly into what we want to do in Colisseum.


It will have a stage in the shape of a coliseum to recreate the gladiatorial fights of ancient Rome in our modern times. There will be different columns placed in a circular way, an elevated atrium where the boss will be and different stone remains of other constructions scattered around the stage, all this so that it can be used as cover.
